item.description:
Yes, it's that time of year again. Time to hijack the walking group for a few hikes (sorry Greg...Oh, come on, you love it). This IS a hike, so please be sure to bring sturdy footwear. A section of the route we are taking is ankle-intensive, so boots are recommended.

We'll meet at the Visitor's Center and take the following route: Bicentennial Trail to High Meadow Trail to Echo Lake Trail to Stage Coach Trail to Harrington Trail (summit) then down Pine Hill Trail back toward the Visitors Center. We've done this before. It's a good-sized loop.

More info on Wachusett Mtn here: http://www.mass.gov/d...

Due to the location, carpooling is recommended.

Please bring plenty of water and a lunch.

Hope to see you all there!
item.name: Wachusett Mountain (Hike)
